objective: Build a CLI client (cli.js) for hearth that connects to the same socket.io backend as the web app. It should: 1) Connect to thehearth.dev socket.io server 2) Use cached username from ~/.hearth-cli.json 3) Display chat messages with colors and timestamps 4) Support sending messages 5) Show @mentions and replies 6) Support /w whisper, /users, /help, /quit commands 7) Work synced with web users in the same chat
